verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Should <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H6030>answered?<s%> and <S%H518>should<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> full of <S%H8193>talk<s%> be <S%H6663>justified?<s%>
Should thy <S%H907>lies<s%> make <S%H4962>men<s%> hold their <S%H2790>peace?<s%> and when thou <S%H3932>mockest,<s%> shall <S%H369>no<s%> man make thee <S%H3637>ashamed?<s%>
For thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> is <S%H2134>pure,<s%> and I <S%H1961>am<s%> <S%H1249>clean<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
But <S%H199><s%> oh <S%H4310>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5414>would<s%> <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H6605>open<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> thee;

And that he would <S%H5046>show<s%> thee the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they are <S%H3718>double<s%> to that which <S%H8454>is!<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5382>exacteth<s%> of thee less than thine <S%H4480>iniquity<s%> <S%H5771><s%> deserveth.
Canst thou by <S%H2714>searching<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H433>God?<s%> canst thou find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H8503>perfection?<s%>

It is as <S%H1363>high<s%> as <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> canst thou <S%H6466>do?<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than <S%H4480>hell;<s%> <S%H7585><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> canst thou <S%H3045>know?<s%>
The <S%H4055>measure<s%> thereof is <S%H752>longer<s%> than the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and <S%H7342>broader<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he cut <S%H2498>off,<s%> and shut <S%H5462>up,<s%> or gather <S%H6950>together,<s%> then <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>hinder<s%> him?
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4962>men:<s%> he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> also; will he <S%H3808>not<s%> then <S%H995>consider<s%> it?
For <S%H5014>vain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> would be <S%H3823>wise,<s%> though <S%H120>man<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> like a wild <S%H6501>ass's<s%> <S%H5895>colt.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and stretch <S%H6566>out<s%> thine <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him;
If <S%H518><s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> be in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> put it far <S%H7368>away,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H168>tabernacles.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shalt thou lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> without <S%H4480>spot;<s%> <S%H3971><s%> yea, thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3332>steadfast,<s%> and shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> fear: <S%H3372><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H5999>misery,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> it as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that pass away: <S%H5674><s%>
And thine <S%H2465>age<s%> shall be <S%H6965>clearer<s%> than the <S%H4480>noonday;<s%> <S%H6672><s%> thou shalt shine <S%H5774>forth,<s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

And thou shalt be <S%H982>secure,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H8615>hope;<s%> yea, thou shalt <S%H2658>dig<s%> about thee, and thou shalt take thy <S%H7901>rest<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
Also thou shalt lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make thee <S%H2729>afraid;<s%> yea, <S%H7227>many<s%> shall make <S%H2470>suit<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> thee.

But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail,<s%> and they shall not <S%H4498>escape,<s%> <S%H6><s%> <S%H4480><s%> and their <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall be as the giving <S%H4646>up<s%> of the <S%H5315>ghost.<s%>
